project.name: Casita Azul - SEO
project.description: SEO optimization for Casita Azul, a Spanish immersion preschool and daycare serving Portland, OR metro area. Focus on on-page SEO fixes, schema implementation, and local search optimization.

metadata.competitive_advantage: Very limited direct competition in Portland Spanish preschool niche

epics.description:
Fix critical H1 tag issues across all main pages. Current H1s are non-descriptive ('Welcome!', 'Discover!') and don't include target keywords.

**Business Impact:** HIGH - H1 tags are a primary ranking factor. Fixing these is a quick win that can improve rankings for target keywords.

**Pages Affected:** 6 (Homepage, Our Story, Programs, Locations, Admissions, Contact)

stories.summary: Update all page H1 tags with keyword-optimized content
stories.description:
Replace generic H1 tags with keyword-rich, descriptive headings.

**H1 Changes Required:**
| Page | Current H1 | New H1 |
|------|-----------|--------|
| Homepage | Welcome to Casita Azul! | Spanish Immersion Preschool & Daycare in Portland, Oregon |
| Our Story | Discover Our Journey! | About Casita Azul: Portland's Latina-Owned Spanish Immersion School |
| Programs | Discover Our Programs! | Spanish Immersion Programs for Infants, Toddlers & Preschoolers |
| Locations | Welcome to Our Casitas! | Spanish Immersion Preschool & Daycare Locations in Portland Metro |
| Admissions | Getting Started | Enroll in Spanish Immersion Preschool & Daycare at Casita Azul |
| Contact | Contact Us! | Contact Casita Azul Spanish Immersion School |

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- All 6 H1 tags updated
- Each H1 contains primary keyword for that page
- No duplicate H1s across site

tasks.description:
Change H1 from 'Welcome to Casita Azul!' to 'Spanish Immersion Preschool & Daycare in Portland, Oregon'

**Technical Note:** Locate H1 in template/CMS. May be in hero section or page title field.

**Target Keyword:** spanish immersion preschool portland

tasks.summary: Update Our Story page H1 tag
tasks.description:
Change H1 from 'Discover Our Journey!' to 'About Casita Azul: Portland's Latina-Owned Spanish Immersion School'

**Keywords:** Includes brand differentiation (Latina-owned) and location.

Change H1 from 'Discover Our Programs!' to 'Spanish Immersion Programs for Infants, Toddlers & Preschoolers'

**Keywords:** spanish immersion programs, preschoolers, toddlers

Change H1 from 'Welcome to Our Casitas!' to 'Spanish Immersion Preschool & Daycare Locations in Portland Metro'

**Areas Served:** Portland, Beaverton, Hillsboro, Lake Oswego
Change H1 from 'Getting Started' to 'Enroll in Spanish Immersion Preschool & Daycare at Casita Azul'
Change H1 from 'Contact Us!' to 'Contact Casita Azul Spanish Immersion School'

tasks.summary: Verify H1 changes and check for duplicates
tasks.description:
After all changes:
1. View source on each page to confirm H1
2. Run Screaming Frog or similar to check for duplicate H1s
3. Document final H1s in spreadsheet

epics.description:
Optimize title tags and meta descriptions for all main pages. Current titles are too short and generic.

**Business Impact:** MEDIUM-HIGH - Improved titles will help with keyword rankings and click-through rates.

stories.summary: Update title tags for all main pages
stories.description:
Optimize title tags with primary keywords and location.

**Title Tag Changes:**
| Page | Current | New |
|------|---------|-----|
| Homepage | Casita Azul | Spanish Immersion Preschool Portland | Casita Azul |
| Programs | Programs - Casita Azul | Spanish Classes for Kids Portland | Infant to Preschool | Casita Azul |
| Locations | Locations - Casita Azul | Portland Spanish Preschool Locations | Beaverton, Hillsboro | Casita Azul |
| Admissions | Admissions - Casita Azul | Enroll in Spanish Immersion Preschool Portland | Casita Azul |
| Our Story | Our Story - Casita Azul | About Us - Latina-Owned Spanish Preschool Portland | Casita Azul |

tasks.description:
Update title tags in CMS or template files:

1. Homepage: 'Spanish Immersion Preschool Portland | Casita Azul' (47 chars)
2. Programs: 'Spanish Classes for Kids Portland | Infant to Preschool | Casita Azul' (65 chars - may truncate)
3. Locations: 'Portland Spanish Preschool Locations | Beaverton, Hillsboro | Casita Azul' (68 chars)
4. Admissions: 'Enroll in Spanish Immersion Preschool Portland | Casita Azul' (57 chars)
5. Our Story: 'About Us - Latina-Owned Spanish Preschool Portland | Casita Azul' (61 chars)
Check each page in browser, view source to confirm title tag implementation.

stories.summary: Add meta descriptions to all pages
stories.description:
Add compelling meta descriptions to all main pages. Currently missing.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- All 5 pages have meta descriptions
- Each 150-160 characters
- Include primary keyword and CTA

tasks.description:
Add meta descriptions:

**Homepage (155 chars):**
'Casita Azul offers Spanish immersion preschool and daycare in Portland, OR. Infant through preschool programs. Latina-owned. Multiple locations. Enroll today!'

**Programs (158 chars):**
'Spanish immersion programs for infants, toddlers, and preschoolers at Casita Azul Portland. Full immersion curriculum. Native Spanish-speaking teachers.'

**Locations (145 chars):**
'Find a Casita Azul Spanish immersion preschool near you in Portland metro. Multiple locations. Schedule a tour today!'

**Admissions (152 chars):**
'Enroll your child in Spanish immersion preschool at Casita Azul Portland. Programs for ages 0-5. Schedule a tour and start the enrollment process.'

**Our Story (156 chars):**
'Learn about Casita Azul, Portland's Latina-owned Spanish immersion preschool. Our mission, values, and commitment to bilingual early childhood education.'

epics.description:
Implement structured data to improve search visibility and rich snippet eligibility.

**Schema Types:**
- ChildCare (with Preschool additionalType)
- EducationalOrganization
- FAQPage

**Business Impact:** MEDIUM - Can improve CTR and establish entity relationships with Google.

stories.description:
Add comprehensive ChildCare schema with Preschool additionalType to establish business entity.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Schema validates in Rich Results Test
- Includes all locations served
- Includes program catalog
- Includes contact information

tasks.summary: Gather all business information for schema
tasks.description:
Collect:
- Full business name: Casita Azul
- Alternate name: Casita Azul Spanish Immersion Preschool
- Phone number
- Email address
- All location addresses
- Areas served: Portland, Beaverton, Hillsboro, Lake Oswego
- Programs offered: Infant, Toddler, Preschool
- Social media URLs (Facebook, Instagram)

Implement schema JSON-LD:

```json
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "ChildCare",
  "additionalType": "https://schema.org/Preschool",
  "name": "Casita Azul",
  "alternateName": "Casita Azul Spanish Immersion Preschool",
  "url": "https://casitaazulpdx.com",
  "telephone": "+1-503-XXX-XXXX",
  "email": "info@casitaazulpdx.com",
  "address": {
    "@type": "PostalAddress",
    "addressLocality": "Portland",
    "addressRegion": "OR",
    "addressCountry": "US"
  },
  "areaServed": [
    {"@type": "City", "name": "Portland"},
    {"@type": "City", "name": "Beaverton"},
    {"@type": "City", "name": "Hillsboro"},
    {"@type": "City", "name": "Lake Oswego"}
  ],
  "description": "Spanish immersion preschool and daycare serving Portland metro families.",
  "priceRange": "$$",
  "knowsLanguage": ["en", "es"],
  "hasOfferCatalog": {
    "@type": "OfferCatalog",
    "name": "Programs",
    "itemListElement": [
      {"@type": "Offer", "itemOffered": {"@type": "Service", "name": "Infant Program"}},
      {"@type": "Offer", "itemOffered": {"@type": "Service", "name": "Toddler Program"}},
      {"@type": "Offer", "itemOffered": {"@type": "Service", "name": "Preschool Program"}}
    ]
  }
}
```

Add to homepage <head> section.

tasks.summary: Test schema in Rich Results Test
tasks.description:
Validate at https://search.google.com/test/rich-results
Screenshot results. Fix any errors or warnings.

stories.description:
Implement EducationalOrganization schema to establish educational institution entity.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Schema on all pages
- Includes sameAs links to social profiles
- Validates without errors

tasks.description:
Add to site template/header:

```json
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "EducationalOrganization",
  "name": "Casita Azul",
  "url": "https://casitaazulpdx.com",
  "logo": "https://casitaazulpdx.com/logo.png",
  "description": "Spanish immersion preschool offering bilingual early childhood education for children ages 0-5 in Portland, Oregon.",
  "sameAs": [
    "https://www.facebook.com/casitaazulpdx",
    "https://www.instagram.com/casitaazulpdx"
  ]
}
```

stories.summary: Add FAQ schema to Programs page
stories.description:
Implement FAQPage schema with 5 relevant questions about Spanish immersion programs.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- 5+ FAQs visible on page
- Matching FAQPage schema
- Schema validates

tasks.summary: Write FAQ content for Programs page
tasks.description:
Create 5 FAQs:

1. **What age groups does Casita Azul serve?**
Casita Azul offers Spanish immersion programs for infants (0-12 months), toddlers (1-2 years), and preschoolers (3-5 years). Each program is designed with age-appropriate curriculum.

2. **Is Casita Azul a full Spanish immersion program?**
Yes, we provide full Spanish immersion with native Spanish-speaking teachers. Children are immersed in Spanish throughout the entire day.

3. **Do children need to know Spanish before enrolling?**
No prior Spanish knowledge is required. Our immersion program is designed for all children, including those with no previous exposure to Spanish.

4. **What locations does Casita Azul have in Portland?**
Casita Azul has multiple locations serving the Portland metro area including Beaverton and Hillsboro. Visit our Locations page for specific addresses.

5. **What is the tuition for Casita Azul programs?**
Tuition varies by program and schedule. Please visit our Admissions page or contact us directly for current rates.

tasks.summary: Add FAQ section and schema to Programs page
tasks.description: Add FAQ section HTML to Programs page and implement FAQPage schema JSON-LD matching the content.

epics.description:
Optimize Google Business Profile listings for all Casita Azul locations to improve local search visibility.

**Business Impact:** HIGH - GBP is critical for local 'near me' searches and maps visibility.

**Locations:** Multiple campuses in Portland metro area.

stories.summary: Audit and claim all Google Business Profile listings
stories.description:
Ensure all Casita Azul locations have claimed and verified GBP listings.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- All locations audited
- Unclaimed profiles claimed
- All profiles verified

tasks.summary: Audit existing GBP listings for all locations
tasks.description:
Search Google Maps for each Casita Azul location:
1. Document all existing listings
2. Note which are claimed/unclaimed
3. Check for duplicate listings
4. Screenshot current state of each

For any unclaimed listings:
1. Initiate claim process
2. Complete verification (postcard, phone, or video)
3. Document verification status

stories.description:
Set optimal categories and complete all business attributes.

**Primary Category:** Preschool or Spanish Immersion School (if available)
**Secondary Categories:** Day Care, Language School

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Optimal categories selected
- All attributes completed
- Hours of operation set

tasks.description:
For each location's GBP:

**Primary Category:** Preschool (or Spanish Immersion School if available)
**Secondary Categories:**
- Day Care Center
- Language School
- Child Care Agency

Note: Categories vary by availability. Check each listing.

For each GBP listing, complete:
- Business name (consistent: 'Casita Azul - [Location Name]')
- Address (verify correct)
- Phone number
- Website URL
- Hours of operation
- Description (use keyword-rich description)
- Services offered
- Attributes (appointment required, wheelchair accessible, etc.)
- Photos (upload 10+ high-quality photos per location)

Add all programs as 'services' in GBP:
- Infant Program (0-12 months)
- Toddler Program (1-2 years)
- Preschool Program (3-5 years)
- Camp Alegria (summer program)
